page.title: 17The Cotswold Hunt
page.content: {The Cotswold Hounds}hunt an area of the Cotswolds bounded by Cheltenhan in the North West running around the escarpmemt to Winchcombe in the North down to Cirencester and Stroud in the South,an area of approximately 30 square miles.{45 couple of hounds}are kennelled at Andoversford. The hounds hunt four days a week, Monday, Wednesday,Thursday and Saturdays. {Foxhunting as a sport has been {enjoyed by those who live in the {area for over two hundred years. It is normal for the Cotswold Hounds to meet in the Bisley,Miserden area on each Monday where the wooded valleys hold many foxes and offer good sport to the mounted and foot followers. {Approximately one hundred foxes are {accounted for each season by the {Cotswold hounds.
